Uses of Class
gwt.g3d.client.gl2.WebGLShader

Packages that use WebGLShader
gwt.g3d.client.gl2 Contains wrappers for WebGL (OpenGL ES 2.0). 
gwt.g3d.client.shader Contains helper classes for managing shaders.
